modmenu.descriptionTranslation.itemflowm: Track item throughput in any container. Monitor items/sec, items/min, items/hour flowing through chests, hoppers, furnaces and more. Features configurable tracking modes (All / Auto / Manual), rate calculations (Average / Actual / Predicted), and an intuitive overlay UI. Supports 12 languages.
